website_summaries.verdict: Easy and quiet to use, this lightweight option comes with 2 extra silicone blades.
pros: Features include a flexible silicone blade and a nonslip detachable handle
Comes with a trio of 8" blades in all
Has an end hook for storage
Blade is designed not to squeak when using
cons: Not for use with an extension pole
Some felt that this squeegee was too small and that it left too many streaks

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance & ordered this, glad I did, it is perfect, very smooth & the handle has a good feel. It also comes with an extra blade. We just ordered 2 more, one will go in our RV. The picture shows how we hung it.
customer_reviews.author: Minime

customer_reviews.title: JUNK JUNK JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: The Squeegees are junk. They were not smooth on bottom. Left streaks and water on flat new shower glass. It would not remove water no matter how little pressure or greater pressure. Replacment blades did not help. Endless emails from desired things asking all types of questions. I purchased a different brand of squeegee and they work GREAT. DO NOT BUY. Desired things DO NOT BACK THERE PRODUCTS!
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on my shower glass.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get the water of the glass in my shower. After reading the reviews I was happy because it came with an extra blade. This squeegee did not get the water off just left streaks all over the shower. It may be a great product for others and I just got unlucky. I do hope that is the case.
customer_reviews.author: Lillysnoopy05

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a shower squeegee, you can do better.
customer_reviews.text: The handle of this squeegee is spongy and therefore it stays wet, long after the rest of the shower is dry. The blade is short and it takes more passes to dry a glass shower door than either of the Oxo squeeges I've used before. And finally, I can't get the darn thing to stay on a suction hook and it is always clattering to the floor. It did not come with a suction hook, but I'm reusing the same one that I've had with other squeeges and something about the physics with this one doesn't work. On the plus side: having the extra blades that they provide is nice and the packaging is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Wondermatic

customer_reviews.title: Best Squeegee Yet!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have always used squeegee's in our showers. It truly does cut down on cleaning and keeps the shower free from hard water stains when used regularly. We have purchased many squeegee's before but this one is the best one we've ever used. It's easy to use and get every single surface. Our tub sides are not smooth (see pics) as well as the glass and this squeegee takes the water off with the first swipe. The fact that it comes with extra blades is an awesome bonus. I knocked one star off because we had to purchase the hook for it. I highly recommend this squeegee! You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: MarielsMom

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the product. I use it for my car windows and it leaves streaks and dirt spots all over the windows. I have found that I need to follow-up with paper towels to get the windows clean. I have much better luck with the gas station one. If you aren't planning to use it on a non-transparent surface I guess it would be OK, but for windows I wouldn't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Spam
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great on a couple windows, but then started leaving streaks all the time. They sent replacement blades which will probably be needed pretty soon. Not as durable as the one I have to wash my car that's 20 years old with a rubber blade. The real problem is that I received 3 messages from the seller fussing at me to review the product. What the heck, it's a squeegee dude. Inappropriate to spam customers for that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say, this squeegee was horrible on my car windows. It left streets and would not remove much water. Yes, I held it correctly and used both light and heavy pressure. It did not work at all. I used an older Unger squeegee to do the job so I'll just get another one of those.
customer_reviews.author: ozzy6900

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for a Shower Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: The blade is very hard and is not tapered, which makes it not very well suited as a shower squeegee. Probably good for shop use, so I'm keeping it, but they shouldn't be listing it as good for showers. Also, it has a foam rubber grip, which holds in water, it does slide off, but then you're left with a skinny plastic handle that isn't comfortable to hold. It does come with extra blades, which I guess is cool. I think it might be good for body repair finish work, to squeegee off water when wet-sanding. That's about the only thing I could imagine it might be good for.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cimino

customer_reviews.title: Give it a little time to settle in
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this squeegee it left big streaks and the blade wouldn't stay put in the handle. This was sufficiently annoying that I even went as far as to change out the blade - no difference. But the next day when I used it everything was fine - no streaks and the blade stayed put. I'm not sure why this happened - naybe it needs to absorb some water or something. My only complaint is the handle material absorbs a little too much water - enough that when you squeeze it the water can run down your arm. But this is not a problem most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ned Freed

customer_reviews.title: What's up with those reviews???
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed as to how many people liked this product because it just did not work well for me. I purchased 2 of this thinking it was really that good but I was wrong. For windows and big mirror..,it fairly works. After you spray, you have to quickly use this squeegee or else when it dries up a little, it will leave marks. You will use a whole lot of window spray for this as opposed to using just rag and paper towel. This does not get into corners, and once it get wet, the blade kept sliding back and forth. So annoying.
customer_reviews.author: genie

customer_reviews.title: OK wiper...nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Well it depends what is the usage. I bought it for glass window cleaning. So, Pros: 1. Cleans the window very well. 2. Good grip 3. Comes with extra wiper blades Cons: 1. While dragging the wiper down, the glass cleaner residue falls on me (each time)...If there was a protection to prevent the residue flying off, it would be great. 2. To clean the soap residue from the wiper, the silicone blade comes off very easily. The slider is not tight. 3. Feels cheap
customer_reviews.author: mfhanif

customer_reviews.title: My after bath tool
customer_reviews.text: Nothing has been more effective to keep the travertino tile of the shower in good condition, by using a squeegee. But this one it has been really a deal! Its flexible and soft silicone blades are of a very good quality. It is very easy to use and the foam handle makes it very comfortable while using it. I use it everyday and the tile looks clean and dry preventing the mold to grow. The best thing is that it comes with 2 extra replacement blades for the same low price! that you can change when the others are no longer usable, which I guess they will take a lot of time to last. I would buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Once over and you're done!
customer_reviews.text: This squeegee works extremely well. The only problem I have is the replaceable silicone strip slides while using it and I have to center it back on the handle. It works much better than the cheaper ones I have picked up at other stores. It gets every drop of water left on the wall and I don't have to go over it a second time. Because of the great job it does, I am willing to deal with the sliding strip and keep using it. This would definitely be a five star item if the strip did not slide off th side of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: It works just fine, but not particularly "good".
customer_reviews.text: My primary (and so far only) use for it is in the shower. It hangs on a hook in the shower and we get the loose water off of the shower doors and from the top ring of the tub after each use. The nature of the hard plastic does not really allow for a smooth scraping of the shower doors though, and screeches often when doing it. I like that it was cheap and came with extra blades for when these ones wear down, but I do not see myself purchasing this item again. Oh, and when the handle gets wet it feels gross (almost slimy), which is weird.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough!!
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, no better or worse than my last few squeegees. Like the extra insert, I'm sure that will come in handy eventually. My biggest complaint, and a very real reason I may return it, is that it is too narrow, would be much better 12 inches wide. Contrary to the video, I do have to use some pressure for it to work, too light and it misses spots. I'm not sure why they make such a big deal about not pressing too hard in the video and online instructions you receive after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: ezaire75

customer_reviews.title: Got to get rid of that shower water !!!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently had my tub removed from my bathroom and installed a beautifuly tiled walk-in shower with glass doors...I'm definitely not a fan of those, but it comes with the territory, so with all the five star rating you folks had received and wanting to keep my dumb doors looking as good as possible, I purchased your squeegee...I keep it handy and after I shower, I grab it and it's the first thing I do is squegee the dumb doors so they look great again..It really works great..Each time I swipe, I use a towel to wipe the blade, then swipe again...Works real well and done in nothing flat...That's my story and I'm sticking to it....
customer_reviews.author: Jan/c

customer_reviews.title: My search is over!
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the best squeegee out there! I’ve been searching for one for a long time and have tried many. But most of them either don’t last, don’t do the job, or are just too cumbersome to hold. Well, my search is over! Not only does this one swish away the water on the shower walls in a flash, it also comes with extra blades! And as an added bonus, it’s comfy to hold. My first impression was that it was too small to do the job but I was soon proven wrong. Its compact shape makes getting into those tight spaces around the faucets so easy. If I could give this product 10 stars I would!!!
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: A must have for those dewy and foggy mornings.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The handle is soft and comfortable to hold. The unit is easy to handle. It cleared my Jeep's windows perfectly!! I should buy another just because I was so impressed. It was packaged well and came with an extra blade AND an information and instructions page. A must have if you're like me and won't move your vehicle until your windows are clear😄
customer_reviews.author: Dolly D. King

customer_reviews.title: Removes waters, soap and suds from shower tile and glass easily
customer_reviews.text: THe squeegee is much more effective in cleaning the shower than others I have owned previously. Suction is excellent and only a few swipes are needed to leave the shower tile and glass clean and virtually dry.The ergonomics are excellennt, nice balance and feels and operates like a high quality product. The suction bracket for attaching to shower wall keeps the squeegee out of the way when not being used. I have not tried for applications beyond cleaning off the shower after use so can't comment on its usefulness for autos, for example, but I would think that it would work well for removal of water from, say windshield, and windows of a car after washing.
customer_reviews.author: neveo

customer_reviews.title: Nice well-made product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old squeegee. I wanted a smaller one, so chose this as it has an eight inch blade while most seem to have a ten inch blade. The squeegee itself is nicely built and comes packaged nicely. The only complaint i have is that the angle of the handle to the blade is such that when you are squeegeeing a shower, a fiberglass insert say with rounded corners, you can't easily pull the blade from one wall to the next through the rounded corner without bumping your hand. Otherwise I wholly recommend this squeegee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Countertop water puddles have met their match!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this squeegee as a solution for keeping my kitchen counter top dry from water puddles and it works great. The previous squeegee I had was older and dirty at the blades so I decided to look for a better alternative. This one fits the bill perfectly. I keep it near the kitchen faucet and it works great for keeping the counter top dry after washing dishes or loading the dishwasher. The squeegee blades are effective at removing the water and they are still very clean - I probably won't have to use the replacement blades for a while. This is a great addition to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: There have been several squeegees in my household over the years I was looking for one with a silicone blade, and recently purchased one online that I thought fit our needs. While I tend to squeegee only the glass doors, my husband likes to squeegee the entire shower. It didn't take long for the silicone blade to tear at the corners. I happened across this little beauty and couldn't be more impressed. It so thoroughly removes the water you can't tell you just showered. It leaves the glass spotless. The blade is very sturdy-and yet they supply two extra blades. I will be purchasing another one for my vacation place.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: May not work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this squeegee for the shower to replace a different kind that was not working as well as it did when new. Based on the reviews, I was excited and prepared to not press down too hard. The silicon blade it arrived with was slightly bent and left a streak pressed lightly or hard. I replaced it with a spare blade. It works all right but only if you press down quite hard. It doesn't work at all unless you do press hard (unlike the suggestions). It is a good thing it has that nice handle because pressing down so hard it a lot of work. Still have one more blade too try!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Wittenbrock

customer_reviews.title: Junky Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this piece of junk. I tried it on a flat glass shower wall and it streaks like crazy. It does not make total flush contact with the glass. Have used other squeegees on the same shower glass without problem. This product is considered inferior.
customer_reviews.author: larryof_oc

customer_reviews.title: This is the one.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the shower to get around the fixtures and do narrow glass panels. Grace from desired things even sent an email ahead of time giving guidance on how it is best used. You may not think you need it but I found her suggestion for a light touch to be right on the money. Nice silicone blade with 2 small ridges that enhance performance. It even came with a extra blade so I expect to have this a long time. This squeegee was a bargain and is the best shower squeegee I've found, I highly recommend it and seller desired things.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: Very good squeegee for your shower.
customer_reviews.text: My first squeegee, love it for the shower. Doesn't work so well on windows though. Leaves them streaked. For the shower with glass doors it works wonder. Don't know how my showers have survived without a squeegee. Yes if you have see through shower doors, get this squeegee today. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Good squeegee
customer_reviews.text: How excited can you get about a squeegee? What I like about this one is the size! It's only 10" wide which is just right for my use in the shower. I also like that it has a replaceable blade. Others I had were not replaceable and the weak point was always where the rubber met body of the squeegee. This one seem sturdier at that point. The handle could be a little shorter as it it awkward in the curved corners of the shower. So far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lennie J

customer_reviews.title: Great Squeegee!
customer_reviews.text: I agree with others that the design is less than optimal, but it's a functional tool in a shower... not something I hang on the fireplace mantle! The squeegee quality is exceptional. It works really well and keeps my glass shower door clean. I have a large walk-in shower with 2 benches, so I use it throughout the shower stall to get rid of sitting water on the 2 benches and bottle shelves. I've had less problems with red algae growing. Love this squeegee!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: GOODBYE LINT ROLLERS!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sucker. It's one of my favorite things I own. But it's never touched a windshield—it's because I own three cats in five colors, and they always shed the wrong one in my clothes. This is MAGICAL for getting animal hair off.... whatever you want, really. Jackets, sheets, even carpets. I wouldn't recommend using it on super delicate fabrics, but I try to keep those away from my cats anyway. It even works on those annoying clothes that the lint roller touches once and gets useless.
customer_reviews.author: Monica N

customer_reviews.title: Who knew there would be a difference???
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this squeegee because we moved into a new house with glass shower doors. I didn't know that there would be a difference until I visited a friend and used their squeegee on their guest shower. Theirs was not very efficient, and I had to work really hard to get the drops off. This product is AWESOME (now that I have a frame of reference). It has just the right weight, it doesn't bend weirdly, it makes good contact with the glass. It is plenty wide so gets the job done. We have been using it for quite a few months now and it shows no sign of wear. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Green

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough.  Silicon does not work well.
customer_reviews.text: I used this squeegee to dry the glass and the fiberglass surround in my shower. My shower is 3 Ft. by 4 Ft. This squeegee is so short that it took me longer to squeegee the shower than it did to get showered. The silicon blade has slanted corners so it doesn't get a clean line on the side of the glass. I used a light touch as was recommended. I made at least three passes with this squeegee in the same spot and it was never free of droplets. If you like to take a long time squeegeeing your shower this is the product for you. I think a towel would do much better.
customer_reviews.author: CLT

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product thinking that having an extra 2 refills would mean it would last longer and cost less in the long run. But, I was very disappointed. The stiff, silicon edge on this squeegee leaves all the water behind on the shower doors. No matter how many times I went over it, no matter which direction I swiped, the water just moved around and didn't come off. I finally wound up cleaning the shower doors with a towel. If I could give it zero stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: booksncoffee

customer_reviews.title: Removes Water Easily & Leaves Walls Dry
customer_reviews.text: I like that the blade is thick yet flexible and that the material the blade is made from really grips the shower & tub walls. The grip pulls all the water droplets off the walls, leaving them dry and spot-free. I bet it works great on glass, too. Two extra blades came with the squeegee. The foam grip on the handle is very comfortable on my arthritic hands. The size makes this squeegee easy to use around faucets, knobs, and in smLL APcea molded into my fiberglass tub/shower.
customer_reviews.author: Neschie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice design, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a light weight nicely designed little squeegee for my shower, easy to use and looks to be a product I will use for a long time! I just wish I had bought this a few months ago when my beautiful curved glass shower was installed! I’m not sure how to safely remove the water and calcium spots from the water resistant surfaces, but for sure with this handy squeegee, they will not get worse nor get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Marva

customer_reviews.title: One of the better tools I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Where has this little miracle been all my life? I bought this squeegee and the Safeway glass cleaner and the two cut my time and effort to a fraction of what I did before. We moved into a house with a lot of windows and the previous owners had not cleaned them in awhile. The silicon squeegee removes most of the dirt, grim, and dead bugs on the windows with the glass cleaner then a quick pass with the squeegee. I’d give this five stars but the silicon blade slides instead of staying in place when you insert it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stotts

customer_reviews.title: This sqeegee is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this squeegee for a week now and so far it works great! The soft handle grip helps to maintain hold in the shower, and there's an opening for a hook to hang it up. The silicone blades are great, I followed the directions to not press down too hard while using it. I have a glass enclosed shower, so the blade slides over the glass easily with minimum pressure. I also love the refills that came with the package, so I don't have to order new ones right away. Top notch product, I will definitely buy it again. Excellent seller, with prompt shipping! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the replacement blades
customer_reviews.text: We have glass shower doors in two bathrooms, and we bought this one to go in one of them. We don't use it with any expectations that it will "clean" the glass, but it's definitely useful to keep the glass so that it's **easier** to clean/relatively streakless. The replacement squeegee blades are nice, especially for the shower door use, where soap residue (regardless of cleaning) is bound to take its toll on the rubber. This was a much better deal than most of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Howjack

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit - Works well - perceived to be a good value
customer_reviews.text: It works as a good squeegee should. I did get it to squeak, but it was doing the job and I adjusted the angle on the glass. Handle is comfortable. The flaring out on each side is not a positive in my opinion - yet it still works fine. At a big box store one can buy a serviceable unit for around $4. This is a step (or two) up and I do not regret the purchase. Prompt delivery and a follow up email from the seller indicates their interest in assuring the customer is satisfied. I like that too.
customer_reviews.author: G. H.

customer_reviews.title: FIRM silicon blade - maybe not so great for shower tiles
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our shower tiles, we have been wiping them down with microfiber cloth after last shower for the morning. this cuts down on mildew tremendously. I thought this would be easier and quicker. but the blade does not work well for us for this purpose, microfilber is quicker and dryer. I think the blade is just too thick or firm. pressing lightly gives little feedback to the user. it comes with extra blades so this is a good deal - but I would not suggest for a shower(tiles), glass door maybe??.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: It cleans down to the shine
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in time and in good condition. It works very well if you use a light touch. I find the slanted extensions on each side to be unnecessary. They are clear and I can't see them when I'm wiping. I cut them square and that works good for me. The 8 inch width is a little too big for some of the areas of my shower and I would be interested in a 6 inch model. I would also like it if a suction hook for the wall was included. The foam on the handle makes it thicker and it doesn't hang flat without a large hook.
customer_reviews.author: new york stater

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Does not lay flush to the glass, and does not grab and push the water away. Leaves streaks, and gaps, I am very disappointed and wanted to love this. Also small, so the stroke coverage is inadequate. Went back †o Amazon and purchased a 12 in rubber blade, metal handled squeegee that works so much better, and gets the job done in half the time. Do not recommend this one with the silicone blade, even though they give you extra blades.
customer_reviews.author: Chaelmom

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Squeege
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of windows and lots of squeegees. I recently decided to see if I could find one that would be better than my current ones. I read the reviews and ordered your version and I LOVE IT! I do wish it came in a choice with a silicone blade that would be a couple of inches longer. However, this cleans so perfectly and leaves no drips so perhaps a longer blade wouldn't have the pressure at the ends like your 8" one does. I am so happy with it and love the comfy foam handle.
customer_reviews.author: Char SRQ

customer_reviews.title: Needed a replacement squeegee for our guest bathroom and its great
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several on Amazon and this was the highest rated and it comes with two extra blades. our current squeegee was in need of replacement and was worried that the foam handle would smell after a while, but it dries our quickly and does work well cleaning the shower. I would strongly recommend buying this unit in white and if it was supplied with a hanger or clip then it would be great. Just used a Command clip to attach it to the wall of the shower and on to my next home project.
customer_reviews.author: Chip 555

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Perfect Size and Excellent and Functional Design
customer_reviews.text: This is a great squeegee that is light weight, but extremely durable and works amazingly well! I bought it to use in my glass enclosed shower/tub and couldn't be happier. It comes with two silicon replacements for the scraper which is an added bonus with this extremely well priced purchase. I also really appreciated the company reaching out to answer questions and the fact that they have a "give back" to their customers program and mentality. From a consumer point of view, I am happy to spend my money buying from companies like Silicon Squeegee!
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great for French doors
customer_reviews.text: I hate cleaning the the little rectangular windows on my French door. They are so hard to get really clean and always appeared cloudy. This squeegee did the trick! The glass has never looked so clear! My only complaint is that the edges of the squeegee are a bit flimsy so the corners of each rectangle are a bit cloudy still as the squeegee can’t quite get on there. Other than that, it’s a great multipurpose tool.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Worst squeegee I have owned!
customer_reviews.text: My dog at my good squeegee and they were back ordered on Amazon. This was the highest rated one that I could get next day. This squeegee did nothing but streak! I sent it back and purchased one from the dollar store that was much better. Save you money if you are trying to use this for a shower door. It might work on a window where you can place a lot of pressure, but on a swinging glass door it stinks. Requires way too much pressure to get it not to streak.
customer_reviews.author: KevinTop Contributor: Snowboarding

customer_reviews.title: I like this squeegee
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using a squeegee for years because it makes shower cleaning so much easier. But I always worried about dropping the metal ones and cracking or chipping the shower base. Not so with this one...light as a feather with a good handle for grasping. Plus its blade is shorter so I can get in between the faucet and spigot. The bonus is replacement blades....hope I can find where I stored them when it’s time to replace!
customer_reviews.author: Up north girl

customer_reviews.title: Great squeegee!
customer_reviews.text: This squeegee mows down water. Overlap your strokes and there won't be a droplet left on the glass. You don't have to press hard but if you wanted to, the padded handle would still be comfy. The handle actually has 2 blades so it's like a razor with extra blades—whatever the first misses, the second picks up. The additional blades are a bonus but I don't expect we'll need them for years.
customer_reviews.author: Janet G

customer_reviews.title: The Best Squeegee Ever
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a silicone squeegee for my new steam shower and everyone out there was too big. This squeegee is not only the perfect size, but made very, very well. It comes with 2 extra silicone replacement blades as well, and a foam handle that will not slip when you are using it. The design is very nice as well, and this seller is very easy to deal with. The squeegee comes assembled and ready for use. I works extremely well on the glass shower leaving no streaks. I bet it would be fantastic on windows in the house as well as the car.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality squeegee, highlighted by the soft silicone rubber blade (and SPARE/replacement blade) that does an outstanding job removing water from my car windows...with just one pass! With other lesser quality squeegees, they'd often leave streaks or require multiple passes to clear water from the windows.... I'm very please with my purchase and would highly recommend this one, even if it's a bit more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: B. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Leaves streaks
customer_reviews.text: I had a really cheap one before which was wearing out. Bought this highly rated but was disappointed. I use it on smooth glass panels only and its hard uneven surface leaves streaks. I have very hard water and it is imp to clean it after every shower. Only spongy or very straight without micro ridges will work, it is neither. I would not recommend it for very smooth glass panels.
customer_reviews.author: Mirza

customer_reviews.title: Great buy....five stars
customer_reviews.text: Buying a squeegee is not a highlight of any given shopping day but I can say it’s a very nice squeegee! Has a great foam handle which isn’t to big for my small hands. Cleans the water off my shower door quickly and efficiently since the blade sits nicely on the glass. The extra silicone replacement blades are nice to have, it would be even better if the company designs a way to keep them attached to the squeegee so they don’t get lost in the shuffle. I would definitely recommend this as a great way to get the water off any glass, indoor or outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Squeegee for "wiping" down the water from the walls and floor after a shower. It is very lightweight with a nice gripping handle. It does a nice job of "wiping" down the accumulated water after a shower, particularly on the glass doors. I appreciate that two extra silicone blades are included in the purchase. If I could make one improvement, I would have preferred a wider blade so I would not have to make as many "wipes" to clean off the accumulated water.
customer_reviews.author: ILovePugs

customer_reviews.title: Not good for glass showers - requires too mny swipes
customer_reviews.text: My wife is adamant that we wipe down our clear glass shower (admitted, I must be whipped). This squeegee works well but is not good for showers. First, is is too narrow which requires multiple additional swipes. Second, and more important, the ends do not catch the water so it sprays out over the edge and wets the area that was just swiped. Although it cleans well, it requires was too many swipes to remove all the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Convenient size, works great and comes with 2 extra blades
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with auto windows, and initially because of its size. Not too big and not too small. The double edge silicone blade does a better job than my other squeegee which has a single rubber blade. Plus it's large enough to quickly cover windshields and even the glass roof on a Tesla, but also maneuverable enough to get the side and corner windows easily. Been using it daily on several cars for a few weeks and no visible wear on the blade yet, plus it comes with two replacement blades so for the price, I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Milligan

customer_reviews.title: This squeegee really works!
customer_reviews.text: After being frustrated by a squeegee of stiff rubber that didn't make a clean sweep of wiping my windows. I ordered this squeegee based on excellent reviews and it works beautifully! Have an 8 foot paned sliding door and my window washer charges by the pane, so it was going to cost $128 just to clean the door-$2 per pane and there are 64 panes. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: I love to cook

customer_reviews.title: Squeegee does not work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Squeegee is absolutely useless for cleaning glass shower doors, it streaks terribly no matter how gently I apply it to the glass or if I use pressure. I have also tried to use it on smooth tiles with the same results. The silicone blade is stiff as a board and will not adhere evenly to the glass surface. If possible I would have given the squeegee 1/2 star only. If I had any brains I would have returned it immediately but for health reasons I didn't want to deal with the hassle of taking it to the post office or UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great squeegee
customer_reviews.text: We had this on our wedding registry but it was one of the few things that we didn’t receive. We bought it with gift cards and love it! We picked it because it had the replacements with it. The only suggestion I’d give is to add the suction holder to it. We had to buy a suction hook for it to hang on in the shower. You could also add a rope to it to hang from your knob, but either way you have to buy something in order to hang it. Great otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously - who writes a review for a squeegee? Well: live and learn. DD#1 dropped and broke our shower squeegee, after some 14+ years of 2-3x daily use. Bought a replacement from a local big box store. It, frankly, sucked, big time. Who knew there was an actual art to squeegeeing?? Returned unsatisfactory model, and proceeded to Amazon for research. Read the reviews on this one - plus it was the right size for our existing shower hook. VERY VERY VERY happy with this purchase. A light touch is all that is required. Elegant, comfy in the hand, and Highly Effective.
customer_reviews.author: akindofmagick

customer_reviews.title: Great Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why it ask if I could rate the suction power of a squeegee, but anyways, I use it in the bathroom when the mirrors fog up, I use it for my car if the inside fogs up for my side mirrors get wet. Cleans great, have been using ever since I purchased and am still on the first blade. A definite must if you are looking for a squeegee of this size.
customer_reviews.author: Xyooj

customer_reviews.title: Use for tub
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size. I did not want a squeegee that was large because our shower has a tub and I wanted something to hit the walls and tub sides with, and along the rim of the tub and corners. We use a shower curtain so I didn't need anything for that. I really like the fact that this is silicone rather than rubber; and a plus is it has two extra silicone scrapers for replacement if needed. The handle fits well and is very comfortable since it is foam.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Gardens 2

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a few times now, and it seems to work fine. Blade is really soft to it conforms to the window shape and wipes well with one pass. I would like to see a larger version though, this one takes a lot of passes to clean a windshield. Another thing I'd like to see is a longer, extendable handle. When the vehicle is wet, you find yourself leaning into the wet surface to reach the window
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Slides the water off with ease.
customer_reviews.text: As the instructions say, use light pressure, and it works waaaay easier than our rubbery plastic one. No squeaks, no strings of droplets. ...looks like it was toweled dry. ..and spare blades. ..but,using it so lightly, one might not need new blades for a long time. I love it. ...wish there were a slightly wider model for our other bath with bigger glass panes. Great product. We just threw away several we've tried from major names. ..gone squeaky in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just love my new squeegee! I wasn't sure that it would work as well as other reviewers said it would, but I decided that I'd try for myself. After all, it wasn't very expensive. I tried it out first on the car windshield. It worked beautifully. The windshield was the cleanest that it has ever been! I couldn't stop admiring how clean it was as I drove. Finally ... a product that works as well as it's supposed to. I'm very pleased. I'm going to buy another one for my sister-in-law who sponges her shower dry. This will be her new favorite product, too.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Not for the Shower
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this squeegee for the shower. It has a nice, comfortable handle, but the blade is silicone not rubber, and doesn't work great for the shower/tub. It might work better for glass shower doors, or a shower with tiles, or for car windows. If you're looking for something for your shower, unless you have a glass shower door or tiled shower, I don't recommend this particular squeegee.
customer_reviews.author: ~Sahrar

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE - SMELLS
customer_reviews.text: Using this for my glass shower & its the perfect size! I found if you press light and dont try to squeegee the water into oblivion it works WAAY better! I love it comes with extra blades as well! UPDATE: Bought this July 2018 it's now March 2019 We can't figure out what smells so terrible in our bathroom. We cleaned the drains & did a cleaning 'over haul'. Finally today my husband noticed the HANDLE to the squeegee reeks! We are throwing it out and will opt. for a version that has no 'fabric' & can be cleaned off easy with a disinfectant after use.
customer_reviews.author: jenguin

customer_reviews.title: Number 1 Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: If you think all squeegees are the same, this one is not... this one works fantastically. I'm using this squeegee in my bathroom for both my tiles and mirror post shower. The "blade" works extremely well and doesn't bend under pressure. Plus, it comes with two extra "blades." I'm thinking of getting another one for my car... instead of using the gas station's. Why I like it: • No streaks • Easy to use • Extra blades • Works great
customer_reviews.author: Beth H Malbon

customer_reviews.title: Handle on white model is grey not black
customer_reviews.text: The photos in the product description show the white model to have a black handle. This is not the case. It is definitely gray, which is irritating because b/w color was the second biggest factor in my decision to purchase it. I am only taking off one star, however, because the product is otherwise excellent, and I might end up preferring a grey/white squeegee in my gray, black, and white bathroom once I get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: VliffleVloffle

customer_reviews.title: It works really well, I appreciate the direction to not press too hard!
customer_reviews.text: For starters, the suction cup won't stick to my plastic shower wall, so forget that... I just had my walk-in shower totally replaced this summer, and I wanted a new squeegee, and I liked the idea of silicone and appreciate the extra blades! It's very easy to use, and I like knowing that it is not hurting the new finish on the walls and floor - my water is hard and I want to get it off before it dries, and that is easy to do before I get out, upon finishing I spray the walls, doors and floor down with the hand-held shower head and proceed to squeegee them down, easy and quick!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Haden

customer_reviews.title: Squeegee for shower- 2 replacement blades included
customer_reviews.text: This squeegee is great! It is comfortable in my hand as I clean off the tiled shower walls. I like that the blade doesn’t have a place for any mold to grow as some other squeegees do. I did not realize that the blade was smaller than my previous one, but it gets into the smaller spaces better, which is a plus! It came with 2 replacement blades which I don’t think i will use any time soon. The color is cool as well- I chose the grey and its a nice shade. I have been using it for a few weeks now and I have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Martina H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this squeegee in my shower. It does a great job on the walls and the glass door! I love that it come with 2 replacement blades. The blades are very easy to slide in the designated slot. The only slight complaint I have is that sometimes the blades starts to slide out while I’m using it. I just slide it back over. I highly recommend this squeegee!
customer_reviews.author: PHW

customer_reviews.title: Nice squeegee
customer_reviews.text: It's early to tell how well the blades will hold up, but having 2 spares will help. If we wear them out, can we get more? I do like the size and grip. I would like a longer handle, but that doesn't seem to be common
customer_reviews.author: JimJoMac

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME, COMPACT BASIC SQUEEGEE
customer_reviews.text: I RATE THIS "b" SQUEEGEE VERY HIGH! IT REMOVES THE WATER FROM MY SHOWER WALLS OF TRAVERTINE STONE EXCELLENTLY, AND MY FIBERGLASS TUB VERY WELL (THOUGH IT IS CURVED). I usually follow-up with a quick wipe-up with an old cotton T-shirt. The only slightly irritating thing is, as I am using the squeegee from top to bottom of walls (on travertine) the squeegee sprays water in my face. This is a minor thing, though! I DO LOVE MY NEW "b" SQUEEGEE! Great follow-up by the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl V.

customer_reviews.title: almost adequate
customer_reviews.text: Blade does not have a beveled edge, thus reducing effectiveness and requiring multiple swipes to remove water. Too expensive for such poor results. My year old O-Cedar squeegee that cost less than $2 still works better and I used it every day. This squeegee will remove water if you don't mind working harder. After being contacted by the seller I did change out the blade, as suggested, and that did help some. I will use this one as a back-up.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Misses down the center
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many squeegees in stores and on line. Not many favorable reviews. I loved the one I had previously but it needed a new scraper and I could not fine one. This scrapper has a bizarre problem. It does a great job except in the very center. It misses 1/16" section each time I use it. This does come with replacement blades which I will insert asap. I hope that's a big improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this squeegee was for the shower tile and I have found it to be an excellent squeegee. The Seller sent an email after the purchase with a brief description in how to use it for optimal results, and they were correct. It glides over the tiles with a very light touch, and also moves much more water than any prior squeegee!!! Plus, it has two replacement blades which makes it eco-friendly!
customer_reviews.author: V. M.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Amazing squeegee - I use it every day after showering and there’s no need to do any special cleaning to my brand new shower doors. Check out the photo as proof.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeDiva

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good size
customer_reviews.text: This is just about perfect in terms of size and shape, small enough to work around faucets, etc. easily, but large enough to move a lot of water. I use it for a large kitchen bar area, soap the whole thing up, then swipe everything into the sink. It comes out nearly dry with one pass, just a bit of touchup with a towel. Good large hole to hang it from in the handle, and a large foam handle that is comfortable to use in any orientation.
customer_reviews.author: Linwood

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This squeege is the first one I've found that will dry my shower walls with the grout lines.. Works great with that and the glass shower door.. My only problem is it is a little too narrow or short... That is it needs to be wider to make fewer passes necessary in the shower... Until they come out with that item I will continue to use this one.. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jumbo Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Squeegee!
customer_reviews.text: I use this squeegee for the cleaning of my windows on my SUV. It does a very nice job and leaves no streaks. I like the size of it especially when doing the side windows. It is just the right size. I am very happy with this squeegee and would buy it again. It sure beats those cheap ones that you buy from the department store such as the ones used at the gas stations. It makes cleaning the windows on my SUV a lot easier. In my opinion it is a very nice product and the shipping was also fast. No complaints on this end.
customer_reviews.author: Riggie

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my shower door and it works well. I squeegee immediately after finishing my shower and my doors look pretty spot free. The only reason I gave it four stars instead of five is it didn’t come with any kind of hook to hang it up. I did love it enough hat I bought a second one for another shower in my house so I wouldn’t have to take the one back and forth. Good buy. Money well spent. I’d buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought the squeegee to replace one used in our glass shower stall. The old one was too stiff and it took several strokes to dry the glass. This one does an excellent job with its softer silicone material, and we're happy with it. I can't comment on durability as we've had it just a few weeks, but it did come with replacement blades. The only disadvantage over the old squeegee is that it's narrower--takes more strokes to clean the same area--but it does a much better job.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Gaston

customer_reviews.title: I really like this squeegee because of the following reasons
customer_reviews.text: I really like this squeegee because of the following reasons: 1 The handle has a nice grip and easy to hold in the shower as we have large glass shower doors. 2) It gets into all of the nooks and crannies 3) It comes with extra blades so you can continue to use the handle (huge plus for me) 4) does a nice job of cleaning the glass and shower walls and windows as well. The only thing is that is squeaks during use which seems have gone away since it has had more use. The item came quickly and the seller put a nice note in the package. Very satisfied and happy.
customer_reviews.author: LV Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: The ends don’t squeegee
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the ends of this squeegee don’t touch the glass so trying to get the water from the edge of the glass is difficult. It’s almost as if the rubber blade is bowed in the middle. Kinda sucks. When i put the corner of the blade to the glass is bends way too much. The middle of the glass looks great but the edges still have water spots because i can’t get them with this damn thing. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great for shower doors
customer_reviews.text: It squeaks less than our previous ones, especially if angled correctly. We're happy that it comes with 2 replacement blades extending its life and making it a particularly good buy. The only complaint we have is that the foam handle retains water and eventually gets a musty smell. I tried washing it but the odor came back, so I just cut off the foam; the plastic handle under that is fine.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly balanced and comfortable in my hand
customer_reviews.text: Best squeegee ever!! Honestly! I’ve owned many and this one is tops!!! It’s like the Cadillac of squeegees. Perfectly balanced and comfortable in my hand, removes water from shower walls and doors, flawlessly, and I think it looks very good when stored in the shower. Comes with 2 extra blade refills, too! Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: leaves streaks -- totally does not touch the glass
customer_reviews.text: Tried to clean a window with this, I am returning it!! Leaves ~1/2" along both edge and 1/2" streak down the center. Tried it three different times with more pressure and less--still the same result. With 32 windows (72" X 36") to clean I can't be bothered with a cheap squeegee. Don't waste your money and time
customer_reviews.author: Misty in Pa

customer_reviews.title: Makes full contact
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this squeegee for each glass enclosed shower in our home. The grip is comfortable enabling constant contact while in use. Zero drops or drips left behind. We purchased a mountable hook to hang this on after use. The product is new so we have not used any of the extra blades provided. Extremely reasonable price for a squeegee including extra blades.
customer_reviews.author: ap 110406

customer_reviews.title: Good Product But Way Too Small for the Task
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product when our shower squeegee wore out. I read the reviews but did not pay attention to the dimensions of the product. It does everything it promises, but is not wide enough to easily perform the task in a large shower. It literally takes twice as long to finish this (admittedly to me) hated task because the narrow squeegee covers such a small area. Would be great if it were twice as wide.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Has replacement blades
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these squeegees that lasted 4 years. I ordered another one because i was happy with the first one. This time the blade that was in the squeegee had a "bad spot" in it. It did not clean the glass smoothly like in the past. I did take out the blade, and replace it with one of the spares, and it is fine. Otherwise i would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: CKHGTV

customer_reviews.title: Good product and company.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my tile shower. It does a better job of removing water from the tile than my plastic one did. Wish it was a little wider, I thought it was 10” wide but that is the handle length. The blade is 8”. Other wise a good product.
customer_reviews.author: MS Girl

customer_reviews.title: Handy squeegee for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I am using this Squeegee to wipe away water that sits on the level portion of the tub and for cleaning mirrors. It does a great job. The quality is very good and I like that it comes with replacement blades. The hole is great for hanging it to dry. I would prefer something different than the foam wrap-around. Perhaps just a wider handle without a separate wrap would have been better for me. However, it is very good and I would recommend it. PROS: - Very good quality - Reasonable price - Replacement blades included - Does a good job wiping surfaces CONS: - Would prefer a wider handle instead of the foam wrap.
customer_reviews.author: JustMyTwoCents

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it mainly because it's so cold and foggy when I go to work in the morning during the winter and my car rear window doesn't have a windshield wiper and it literally takes me less than a minute to clear it plus my side windows. So far no complaints and I really like that they come with silicone replacements just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Blades come out!
customer_reviews.text: It's nice that they send you additional blades...BUT I don't want to replace one after every two or three swipes (as the blade slides way out too easily!). I ordered a replacement and gave this one to my husband. I suppose if you don't mind pushing the blade back in five or six times while wiping down your shower, then this would be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning shower doors and glass walls!!
customer_reviews.text: This squeegee is amazing. The vendor sent me a quick email prior to arrival thanking me for my purchase and giving instructions for use. They recommend a light touch when using the squeegee. I does work very easily with just a light touch, no need for applying pressure. Best of all not squeaking noise. My textured shower door and smooth glass walls are both completely dry to the touch after using. The added bonus is receiving 2 replacement blades.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Five Star Review
customer_reviews.text: This is the Cadillac of squeegees. The large comfortable foam handle guarantees I won’t be getting carpal tunnel! I have taught my kids to wipe down the shower after bath time and so far none of them have been able to rip the blades off. The product comes with replacement blades so once they do (because kids are why we can’t have nice things) I can replace them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Cockrill

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well
customer_reviews.text: Was not as expected. The wiping edge is hard and squared off instead of being soft and tapered. Did not work as well as our old one. Only gave this 2 stars because not only do they provided extra blades but the packaging was a ziplock style bag instead of a hard to open package. Wish the product worked as well as the thoughtful packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Quark

customer_reviews.title: Preforms well.
customer_reviews.text: Does what a squeegee should do. Could do with a different handle cover, but so far it seems fine. Just seem a bit odd to have something that holds water like a sponge in the shower. If it starts showing signs of mildew then I'll just slide it off. Nice to have the extra blades but by the time I wear this one out I will have probably lost them. The addition of a suction cup hook would of been nice. Works much better than my old rubber one.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Shower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this squeegee to use on a new shower door, and it's working great. Does an excellent cleaning job, leaving just a few drops to be finished off with a soft cloth. It's not as wide as some I considered, and that's a plus for me. Just the right size. I'd definitely choose this one again, and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

product_meta.title: Squeegee for Shower, Window and Car Glass - 2 Extra Silicone Replacement Blades - Foam Handle - Color Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black
Inside Package: 
➤ 1 Squeegee. Size: 10" x 8". Weight: 4 oz. Material: Solid ABS Plastic & Foam Handle. 
➤ 2 Replacement Blades. Size: 8". Material: Silicone. 

Additional Features: 
● Lightweight design makes it easy to use and store in smaller spaces. 
● High quality silicone blades prevents loud squeaking noises during use. 
● Interchangeable blade feature saves not only money, but nature as well. 

We Provide: 
✓ Top Quality Guarantee 
✓ 1 Year Warranty 
✓ Secure Payment & Shipping 
✓ Genuine Customer Care 

How does the Top Quality Guarantee work? 
If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality of the product within 40 days, 
simply reply to the shipping email that you will have received from us and 
let us know about the issue. We will assist you within one day. 

Go to the top of this page to grab your Silicone Blade Squeegee now and get started.
feature_bullets: All-purpose squeegee for wiping shower doors & walls, tiles, windows, car windshield and windows.
Includes a total of 3 dual-edge blades (8") that can last equal to 6 squeegees.
Streak-free & squeak-free water control thanks to its even & flexible silicone blade.
Soft non-slip and detachable foam handle provides extra comfort and ergonomics.
Package contents: 1 Squeegee (black) & 2 silicone replacement blades.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,790 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
